mapper.select: select * from goods where goods_name LIKE '%${goodsname}%'
select count(*) ordersCount from orders where account=#{account} and order_status=0
select count(*) torderCount from orders where account=#{account} and order_status=3
select bulletin_content from bulletins where bulletin_title=#{bulletinstit}
select count(*) CartCount from cart_details where account=#{account}

select min(price) price ,goods.goods_img,goods.goods_name from goods,goods_details,spec where goods.goods_no=spec.goods_no and spec.spec_no=goods_details.spec_no group by goods.goods_no,goods.goods_name,goods.goods_img

select spec.spec_no, goods_img,brand_name,spec_type,price from goods_details, spec,goods,brands where goods_name=#{goodsname} and goods.brand_no=brands.brand_no and spec.goods_no=goods.goods_no and goods_details.spec_no=spec.spec_no
select price from goods_details, spec where goods_details.spec_no=spec.spec_no and spec.spec_no=#{specno}
select area,address_detail,address_no from user_address where account=#{account}
